TemporalDirections.TEXT: 229,ELAINE,"Blonde hair, remember? Glasses? (pause) Have you totally blocked out the entire time we were a couple?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 230,JERRY,(a lightbulb goes on in his head) Riverside Drive.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 231,ELAINE,"Right! In fact... No, never mind...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 232,JERRY,"Well, what is it?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 233,ELAINE,"Well, a bunch of people are getting together tomorrow night at some bar for her birthday, but... (Jerry turns in disgust) you dont want to go to... that... no.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 234,JERRY,"Wait a second, wait a second. We could work out a little deal here.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 235,ELAINE,What little deal?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 236,JERRY,"I will go to that, if you go with me to a little family wedding I have on Saturday.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 237,ELAINE,"A wedding? Have you lost it, man?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 238,JERRY,"Yknow, my parents are coming in for this...",1.0,S01E01,1.0
